name: Elly The Jelly
description:
Take action in this awesome Party Game!
Gather your friends and loose your friendship laughing!

To play this amazing platform-shooter you must shoot pieces of you at your enemies, trying to push them out of the arena!
Be careful! Each piece you shoot, you loose in weight, making yourself easier to push!
But you can take back your pieces, or the ones of your enemies! Awesome!

As if it wasn't enough, there are also plenty of items that can be used to help you claim victory, or just to make everything more chaotic!

At least 1 controller or another device running the game in a local network is needed to play.
